metadata.description: Gumby, Pokey and the gang are back with new adventures for the first time in over ten years! Newly reimagined stories bring the magic of the classic clay boy to a new generation. First, moon creatures invade the toy store where Gumby lives! Gumby and his friends must muster up the courage to contain these triangular foes.  Also featuring more stories of the flexible green gumbino told by today’s top storytellers.
metadata.name: Gumby
